body.p: We are pleased to notify you that after the review of your existing land lease, our underwriting department has approved your agreement for the Dundee Spark Land Lease Program. Based on your approval and subject to the terms and conditions set forth in the Settlement Price Statement attached, we will present you with an up-front payment in full to the amount of:

Enclosed in this document you will find a detailed breakdown of your settlement price along with a Land Owner Information Form. Please take a moment to review these documents and ensure all information is complete and correct.

ul.li: Review your offer your legal and/or financial advisor(s). <#if data.proposal.compensation?number != 0> If you decide to accept our offer, Dundee Spark will compensate you with a $${data.proposal.compensation?number?string("###,###,###")} to put towards your legal and/or accounting bills. </#if>
Complete documentation necessary for our due diligence process.

body.p: This information will allow us to complete your final contract and for you to collect your money as quickly as possible.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact your Acquisition Manager, ${data.proposal.salesrep.name} by phone at ${data.proposal.salesrep.phone} or by e-mail at ${data.proposal.salesrep.email}.
Thank you for your interest in the Dundee Spark Land Lease Program, we look forward to working with you in the future.

Warren Cherry
Vice-President of Operations
Dundee Spark Land Lease Partners

td.p: The above pricing does not constitute a final offer, merely an expression of interest in completing a transaction at the stated settlement price for the purchase and sale of leasehold rental income streams or easement payment income streams subject to and in accordance with the Agreement for the Purchase and Sale of Rights (the "Agreement"), which provides the full transaction terms and conditions and which will be provided to you respecting the proposed transaction. The pricing provided above is based on market conditions as of the date hereof, the information you have provided to Dundee Spark and Dundee Spark's due diligence to date. Dundee Spark reserves to the right to not complete the transactions contemplated by this Settlement Price Statement and/or the Agreement, to revise the pricing based on final due diligence investigations and/or based on market conditions at the time of execution of the Agreement. The information contained herein was prepared by management of Dundee Spark based on information you have provided to Dundee Spark, is confidential and is intended solely for our internal informational use only and may not be reproduced, disseminated or distributed in whole or in part at any time, in any manner or for any purpose, except to your legal and financial advisors for purposes of considering the sale of future lease or easement payments to Dundee Spark. Dundee Spark makes no representations or warranties whatsoever respecting the financial, tax or legal aspects of the proposed transaction. You are advised to obtain your own independent financial, tax, legal or other advice in respect of the proposed transaction prior to entering into any agreement with Dundee Spark.
